body:
Aunukia@yahoo.com via email reported:

I saw the AI sac 1 on turn 1, play another, sac it and play a Nip Gwyllion
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: AI almost always immediately sacs Blood Pet.
content:
